articles.author: Jacques Pauw
articles.title: Zuma man's fake degree | Citypress - News24
articles.description: Other prominent South Africans who have fudged their qualifications are former SABC chief operating officer Hlaudi Motsoeneng (no matric), former arts and culture minister Pallo Jordan (no doctorate).
articles.content:
NEWS
For many years, former spy chief and prisons boss Arthur Fraser has claimed to hold a degree from one of the most prestigious higher learning institutions in the world: the University of London… [+130 chars]

articles.author: Alexander Winning, Gibran Peshimam
articles.title: Malawi detects polio, first wild case in Africa in over 5 years - DispatchLIVE
articles.description: Malawi has declared a polio outbreak after a case was detected in a young child in the capital Lilongwe, the first case of wild poliovirus in Africa in more than five years, the World Health Organisation (WHO) said.
articles.content: Sequencing of the virus conducted in February by SA's National Institute for Communicable Diseases and the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention confirmed it as type 1 wild poliovirus (WPV1).… [+1125 chars]

articles.description: The African Union (AU) said it is preparing to activate emergency response measures in polio-affected
articles.content:
The African Union (AU) said it is preparing to activate emergency response measures in polio-affected areas in Malawi and conduct subsequent development of an outbreak support plan.
